skills.learning_skills: Technological skills in development and improvement

technologies.full_stack_developer_tinge: WebFlow / Wized / Supabase / Xano / Lovable / React / TypeScript / JavaScript

descriptions.frontend_developer: I participated in the development of modern web interfaces with Angular and TypeScript, applying good UX/UI practices and performing integrations with RESTful services. I performed unit testing with Jasmine and Karma, collaborated with design teams and followed agile methodologies to ensure the quality and scalability of projects.
descriptions.full_stack_developer: I handle site layout using Webflow, directly integrating advanced functionalities through Wized. I develop dynamic interfaces with JavaScript, TypeScript and React, and manage authentication and data storage through Supabase. I also integrate external APIs and connect various platforms to optimize connectivity, scalability and user experience in each project.

descriptions.rutas_para_moteros: Web-mobile application developed during my training at SENA, oriented to motorcycle travelers in Colombia. As a mobile developer, I worked on implementing custom routes, image uploading with Firebase, JWT authentication and REST API consumption. The app promotes responsible motorcycle tourism, allowing users to trace, share and rate routes.
descriptions.equirent: Web platform that transforms urban mobility in Colombia through vehicle rental by hours, days or long term, and the sale of semi-new vehicles. I handle system maintenance, integration of new functionalities, API connection, authentication and administrative modules. The solution eliminates financial barriers by offering access without down payment, fixed costs that include maintenance and insurance, and promotes flexible, sustainable mobility with positive social impact.
